org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.graph

Class TopologicalSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.graph.TopologicalSort

  • public final class TopologicalSort
extends Object
    Class with static methods for topologically sorting nodes in an IGraph.

    • Method Detail

      • sort

        public static <V,E extends IGraphEdge<V>> void sort(IGraph<V,E> graph,
                                    Collection<V> rootedVertices,
                                    TopologicalSort.IVisitor<V,E> visitor)
                 throws CircularDependencyException
        Topologically sorts nodes in an IGraph. This method assumes the elimination of all non-topological edges in the graph would make the graph a directed acyclic graph ( DAG ). Topological edges are those edges for which the isTopologicalEdge method of the specified visitor returned true. This method will call the visit method of the specified visitor for each vertex, v, after all vertices pointed at by v with topological edges have been visited. After a vertex, v, has been visited any other vertices pointed at by v with non-topological edges are visited. The specified comparator is used to ensure the order in which vertices are visited is stable for a given topology.

        The ordering generated by this method will be stable if the ordering of all vertices in the graph using the specified comparator is stable.

        Callers should detect and eliminate cycles in the graph of vertices connected by topological edges before calling this method. If there are cycles in the graph of vertices connected by topological edges, this method will produce a potentially invalid ordering. Cycles created by edges that are not topological edges are harmless.

        Type Parameters:
        V - Vertex type parameter of IGraph
        E - Edge type parameter of IGraph
        Parameters:
        graph - IGraph whose vertexes will be topologically sorted.
        rootedVertices - Collection of vertices and whose topologically connected vertices should be visited.
        visitor - IVisitor whose visit method is called for each vertex in topological ordering.
        Throws:
        CircularDependencyException

      • sort

        public static <V,E extends IGraphEdge<V>> List<V> sort(IGraph<V,E> graph,
                                       Comparator<V> vertexComparator)
                    throws CircularDependencyException
        Convenience wrapper for sort(IGraph, Collection, IVisitor) that topologically sorts all vertices in a graph and returns a list of all the vertices in topological order.
        Type Parameters:
        V - Vertex type parameter of IGraph
        E - Edge type parameter of IGraph
        Parameters:
        graph - IGraph whose vertexes will be topologically sorted.
        vertexComparator - Comparator to compare two vertexes, such that the topological order will be stable.
        Returns:
        List of all vertices in the graph in topological order.
        Throws:
        CircularDependencyException
